issue.title: Fix Apache Rat errors from source release build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-938](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-938). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Generated files from the glib build, and a new shell script are flagged by the Rat report

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-938?focusedCommentId=15993615) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 632
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/632>
